official_title: Visiting Assistant Professor of Practice in Economics
bio:
Fan Yang is a Visiting Assistant Professor of Practice in Economics at NYU Shanghai. Prior to joining NYU Shanghai, he was a PhD candidate at the University of Missouri Columbia. He holds a PhD from the University of Missouri Columbia in Economics, an M.S in Financial Engineering from the University of Michigan Ann Arbor and a B.A in Mathematics and Economics from the University of Wisconsin Madison. Professor Yang’s research interests are Industrial Organization, Microeconomics Theory and Game Theory. His work has appeared in Games.
